attributes.action: stop talking about cutting police paperwork and actually cut it!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is a fact that police paperwork is getting in the way of Police Officers doing the job they join up to do.

Many people, including Chief Constables, have said some paperwork is not needed and bureaucratic.

Stop talking about and lets take some action.

How did the police 30 years a go manage to police the streets and do less paperwork?

Lets do something, lets not just talk!!.

So please, lets cut pointless police paperwork and red tape now. Lets see some action!
